~MvA ApaqstasmA#-daqdBirava#tAnta-maqBi Shi#~jcantiq nA&&*rtiqmArcCa#tiq sarvaqmAyu#rEtiq yasyaiqtA u#padhIqyantEq ya u# cainA EqvaM ~MvEdAnnaqM ~MvA Apa#H paqSavaq ApO&nna#M paqSavO$&nnAqdaH pa#SuqmAn Ba#vatiq yasyaiqtA u#padhIqyantEq 
ya u# cainA EqvaM ~MvEdaq dvAda#Sa Bavantiq dvAda#Saq mAsA$H saM~MvathsaqraH sa#M~MvathsaqrENaiqvAsmAq - [  ] 6
